original: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la @46a * //
analyzed: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la @46a * //

original: phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sred pa'i 'dod pa bsrung par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par bum pa la sogs pa rdzas kyi rim pa ba sogs la /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal lo // sred pa'i 'dod pa bsrung par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par bum pa la sogs pa rdzas kyi rim pa ba sogs la /

original: h'um las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rin po che dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal du langs te /
analyzed: h'um las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rin po che dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal du langs te /
translated: A practitioner who is bound by the commitments and who wishes to protect the desires of craving should, in a pleasing place, rise up with the pride of being the king of desires, yellow in color, with one face and two arms, holding a jewel and a hook, from the syllable hūṃ, in a place such as a vase.

original: sngags 'di la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yid kyis brjod nas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lta stangs kyis bltas na tshong las rgyal ba'i don nges par 'grub ste sngags ni /
analyzed: sngags 'di la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yid kyis brjod nas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lta stangs kyis bltas na tshong las rgyal ba'i don nges par 'grub ste sngags ni /
translated: If one gazes with the gaze of holding a hook, having mentally recited this mantra one hundred and eight times, one will definitely accomplish the aim of victory in business. The mantra is:🔽oṃ hara hara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ha ra ha ra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pas kha shar phyogs su bltas te brjod na tshong gang byas pa las rgyal bar nges so //
analyzed: aom ha ra ha ra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pas kha shar phyogs su bltas te brjod na tshong gang byas pa las rgyal bar nges so //
translated: If one recites this, facing east, one will definitely be victorious in whatever business one undertakes.

original: tshong las rnam par rgyal ba sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: tshong las rnam par rgyal ba sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The method of accomplishing victory in business is complete.
